claims.claim: Grassroots organizations can identify and address local injustices through campaigns.
claims.quote: What we do is identify injustices and we build campaigns around those injustices.

claims.claim: Local businesses can act as social support networks within communities.
claims.quote: They're a grocery store, but they see the same people. The people that live in the neighborhood, they are yet another source of support.

claims.claim: Faith-based organizations have a duty to support their communities.
claims.quote: I also belong to a couple of faith-based organizations where we have an obligation to the community.

claims.claim: Engineering and critical thinking skills can enhance community problem-solving.
claims.quote: I think those, those critical skills that I learned in college and then on the job are things that help me look at things a little different here.

claims.claim: Genesee County residents should not wait for external rescue; economic revitalization from previous industrial heights is unlikely.
claims.quote: In Genesee County, we can't wait for nobody to come save us. The, the factories are not coming back.

claims.claim: The physical and social environment in Flint, including water issues and housing conditions, significantly impacts mental health.
claims.quote: We still can't use our water. So a lot of this weighs on your mental health.

claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals face mental health challenges and feelings of inadequacy upon reentry.
claims.quote: I can only imagine how they feel when they're feel inadequate when they come out and they don't have the support system.

claims.claim: Connecting returning citizens to grassroots organizations can aid in their reintegration and skill development.
claims.quote: Connect them to a grassroots organization. I think they can get all of that and people will want to pour into their development.
